title: Quick Kayn mission question
body: For the Rhaast icon mission it says you need a double kill, does it mean I need to get it on Kayn/Rhaast or any champ

replies.body: Per the mission, you'll have to play as Darkin Kayn for the double kill.  Some missions will usually info about exceptions like, 'as, with, or against.'  Let me know if that clears things up!
It does thanks, now if only I could get Kayn @_@
He should be on free rotation soon!
Naw I have him, its just that people that its either ban or auto lock {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
